title: Computer Science Pedagogy Workshop Utilizing Game Design Software

context.prior_knowledge: Core Computer Science Concepts and Programming Experience, Practical Experience in Educational Settings
context.additional_context: Training program for pre-service and in-service teachers to acquire computational thinking pedagogy using game development tools (Unity 3D)

learning_goals: Develop two or more educational materials visualizing computer science concepts (algorithms, data structures, etc.) using Unity 3D basic functions.
Propose three or more student motivation strategies when designing lessons applying game-based learning principles.
Write an analysis report on the educational effectiveness of project deliverables (game prototypes) through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
